description: portrait of man; head and shoulders; large ruff; armour; three quarters view; oval cartouche with square frame
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black around portrait: [ILLUSTRISSIMUS ET EXCELLENTISSIMUS AMBROSIUS SPINOLA MARCHIO SESTII ET VENAFRI DVX SANSEVERINI EQUES AVERI VILLERIS REGI CATHOLICO A CONSILIUS STATUS ER BELLI MILITÆQ ET ÆRARII REGII IN BELGIO PRÆFECTUS]; in portrait in black: [SPINOLA pacis amans, ac bello ferreus heros/ Sic versus Belgis dicitur esse Pater./ IMPERO MAX. MAXIMA INEST CURA/ CI ) I)C XXIII]; in frame lower left: [PET DE JODE EXECUDIT]
title: Portrait of Ambrosius Spinola
